title: When is the new Ranked Champ Select coming to normals?

replies.body: Pretty sure a Rioter mentioned somewhere it would be coming out with Solo Que. So probably not for a few more months

We were promised during the pre-season that Normal Blind Pick would be replaced with Normal Dynamic.

However it's been quite sometime since anything has been said by Riot on this, likely they've canceled that whole idea, so we just have to continue suffering with people instant locking and refusing to accept call order.
